home.headline: Listening, understanding, and telling stories that matter.
home.subheading: Every brand has a story. I'm here to listen, find what makes it special, and help that story shine.

about.headline: From a safe choice to a true passion.

story.title: Four Years and a Defining Decision
story.content:
My path wasn't a straight line. I started at medical universityâ€”a choice considered safe and prestigious. That environment taught me discipline, logical thinking, and the ability to perform under immense pressure.

But deep down, I realized it wasn't where I truly belonged. I craved a more dynamic environment where I could use creativity to build connections on a larger scale, rather than just one-on-one interactions. Honestly, it was not an easy decision.

bridge.title: The 'Bridging' Phase
bridge.content: Instead of rushing, I took the time to truly 'research' and 'experiment.' I delved deep into the marketing industry, took online courses, and started my first small projects. This phase solidified my conviction: **this was the path I wanted to take.** It wasn't a 'gap' in my journey, but a purposefully built 'bridge'.

approach.title: And This is How I Approach Marketing Today
approach.intro: That journey has shaped who I am and how I work. I didn't stumble into Marketing by chance; it was a conscious choice. Therefore, I approach everything with:

items.title: Curiosity and a Hunger to Learn
items.desc: As an 'outsider,' I always maintain a beginner's mindset, never afraid to ask questions and always digging deeper to truly understand the problem.

items.title: Logical & Clear Thinking
items.desc: My scientific background helps me approach marketing challenges systematically, from research and planning to measuring effectiveness.

items.title: Persistence and Commitment
items.desc: I worked hard to get here. Because of that, I bring 100% effort and a strong sense of responsibility to every task I undertake.
